Paper.Title: CRITAC- A JAPANESE TEXT PROOFREADING SYSTEM

Section.Paragraph: CRITAC (CRITiquing using ACcumulated knowledge) is an experimental expert system for proofreading Japanese text.

It detects mistypes, Kana-to-Kanji misconversions, and stylistic errors. This system combines Prolog-coded heuristic knowledge with conventional Japanese text processing techniques which involve heavy computation and access to large language databases.
